#summary Range Operations.

In some situations (see [Experiment Experiment]), it is useful to have a declarative mini-language to specify computations involving iterative parameters. The [https://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/rangeoperation range operation package and sub-packages] provide classes with this functionality.
<p>
Please see javadoc for more details and examples.
